name: Wormhearted Suffragan
description: A medium-sized undead creature with the ability to control lesser undead and inflict diseases on its enemies.
memorable: Has the unique ability to raise humanoids it has killed as skeletons or zombies, forming a small army.
goals: To spread disease and chaos, utilizing its control over the undead.
relations: Often encountered with other undead creatures; potentially serves more powerful undead beings.
environment: Commonly found in graveyards, ruins, or dark, decaying locations.
strengths: Magic Resistance makes it hard to control with magic; can create an army of undead.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to radiant damage, indicating a significant weakness to holy magic.
attacks: Can use a Worm-Coated Fist attack that deals bludgeoning and necrotic damage, or a ranged Paralyzing Bolt attack.
most_powerful_ability: Master of Undeath allows it to animate dead humanoids, adding to its army of undead.
senses: Possesses darkvision up to 60 feet and a passive Perception of 13, allowing it to be aware of its surroundings.
skills: Proficient in Medicine and Religion, giving it an edge in healing and knowledge about the undead.
additional_information: Immunity to necrotic damage and poison, showcasing its undead nature.
Cannot be poisoned, adding to its resilience.
Does not require air, food, drink, or sleep due to its Undead Nature.
test_queries: creature that inflicts diseases and paralysis
medium undead with strong necrotic abilities
resilient undead that commands lesser zombies
chaotic evil creature with magic resistance
